intro: Limnoxeranthemum, commonly known as the silverleaf daisy, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its silvery-gray foliage and daisy-like flowers that range in color from white to pale yellow. Native to southern Africa, these plants are often found in rocky or sandy soils. They are typically low-growing shrubs with a compact, bushy appearance. Limnoxeranthemum species are valued for their ornamental appeal and drought tolerance.
